## ReturnValue type

Selection set-aware CRUDL operation return value type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ReturnValue<M extends Model, FlatModel extends Model, Paths extends ReadonlyArray<ModelPath<FlatModel>>> = Paths extends never[] ? M : CustomSelectionSetReturnValue<FlatModel, Paths[number]>;
```
